mdRecord.dcterms:title: Washington City Views. No. 2748. Tomb of the Mother of Washington.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the tomb of Mary Ball Washington, mother of George Washington, in Fredericksburg, Virginia. A male figures pays his respects. Mounted on yellow board. A label adhered to the reverse reads: Washington City Views. No. 2748. Tomb of the Mother of Washington. Published by E. & H. T. Anthony & CO., Emporium of American and Foreign Stereoscopic Views, Chromos and Albums, 591 Broadway, opposite Metropolitan Hotel, New York.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fredericksburg (Va.)
Washington, Mary Ball, 1708-1789
